mapper.select: SELECT * FROM table_shoes WHERE release_date > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() ORDER BY release_date ASC;

SELECT product_num,name,color,method,launched,release_date,release_url,release_site,timestampdiff(MINUTE,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(),release_date) time_remaining FROM table_shoes WHERE launched = 'N' GROUP BY name,release_site ORDER BY release_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM table_shoes WHERE launched = 'Y' ORDER BY release_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM table_shoes WHERE launched = 'N' ORDER BY release_date ASC LIMIT 10;
